error.send_verification_code: Failed to send the Apple ID Verification Code

error.stat_zone_base_lat_range_error: The value must be between -90 and 90
error.stat_zone_base_long_range_error: The value must be between -180 and 180
error.required_field_device: At least one device (Family Share List, Find-my-Friends, iOS App device must be specified
error.unknown_devicename: The device that was previously selected can no longer be identified. It`s name may have been changed or it may have been deleted. Reselect the device to be tracked or monitored
error.unknown_value: The value of this parameter in the iCloud3 configuration file is unknown or invalid. It must be selected again
error.display_text_as_no_gtsign: The '>' between the ActualText and DisplayAsText is missing
error.duplicate_ic3_devicename: This name is already used by another iCloud3 device
error.duplicate_other_devicename: This name is already used in another integration or platform
